org.mxupdate.update.util
Class AbstractParser_mxJPO

java.lang.Object
  org.mxupdate.update.util.AbstractParser_mxJPO
Direct Known Subclasses:
DimensionDefParser_mxJPO, PolicyDefParser_mxJPO
public abstract class AbstractParser_mxJPO
extends Object

The class is used to define common methods for parsers within updates.

Version:
